Name: Arcane Haven
Story Background: Arcane Haven is a realm where the forces of magic coalesce, creating a sanctuary of mystical energies. It is a place of great significance to spellcasters, where the very essence of magic flows freely, empowering all who draw near.
Ability: Arcane Haven enters the battlefield untapped and adds one colorless mana to your mana pool. You may also tap Arcane Haven to add one mana of any color to your mana pool if you control a wizard.
Appearance Description: Arcane Haven portrays a surreal, ever-shifting landscape adorned with glowing runes and arcane sigils. The land emanates an ethereal glow, and wisps of magical energy dance around it, evoking a sense of boundless arcane potential.
